title: How do I cash out from GCash Partner Outlets?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I cash out from GCash Partner Outlets?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39566551006361-How-do-I-cash-out-from-GCash-Partner-Outlets)
- [How do I cash out using RCBC Scan to Withdraw?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39565800262041-How-do-I-cash-out-using-RCBC-Scan-to-Withdraw)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To cash out via GCash Partner Outlets, follow the steps below:

1. Tell the cashier you want to cash out from your GCash Wallet.
2. Give your **mobile number and the amount** you want to cash out.
3. Show a **valid government ID**.
4. Wait for an SMS, then reply with the OTP.
5. Get your cash from the cashier.
